name: A Lupine Rebirth
description:
Story

After the impact of a relatively small meteor, some lands were destroyed. Wolves survivors try to rebuild. The protagonist does quests for people to rebuild. Hunting and gathering, finding materials, finding survivors… It’s not the end for their civilization, it’s a new era beginning.

Controls: 

WASD / Arrow Keys -> Move
E -> Interact
Space -> Jump

Note:
We unfortunately didn't have the time to work on the game, there's only 2 quests sort of playable. 
One of them is located roughly where the wolf at the start is looking at, a bit behind where the "lake" is. 
The other one is a bit more towards left of it, near where the "river" seperates.

Thank you for playing the game.

Made by Over and Syntriax

All assets are made by us.
